snippet: The league is helping to finance research that is investigating whether therapy can speed athletes’ recoveries from concussions.
abstract: NFL announces that it will help fund research on concussion treatment and hopes studies will help determine ways to speed recovery and minimize effects.
lead_paragraph: The league is helping to finance research that is investigating whether therapy can speed athletes’ recoveries from concussions.

headline.print_headline: N.F.L. to Help Fund Search for New Concussion Therapy
headline.main: N.F.L. to Help Fund Search for New Concussion Therapy
